feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Rerouting a booking with corrected responses by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17074
  • perf: Increase vCPU for slots and routing forms by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17181
  • refactor: Minor settings style & copy alterations by @baileypumfleet in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17178
  • fix: Add troubleshooting data and ensure no errors in live mode of router. by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17188
  • fix: allow gCal installs without a primary calendar by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17189
  • perf: Single query user enrichment calls by array of userIds instead by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17190
  • perf: duplicate getSchedule request by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17191
  • docs: small optimization by @mfranzke in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17183
  • fix(a11y): text color contrast by @mfranzke in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17166
  • chore: v4.6.6 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17199

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.5...v4.6.6

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: added aria-label to prev and next month buttons by @shivambhatia604 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17198
  • fix: Add fallback schedule for non-onboarded team members by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17196
  • fix: multiselect "Any in" operator for a user with just one option assigned for the attribute by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17200
  • perf: Remove tRPC event call from server-side props by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17205
  • chore: v4.6.7 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17208

New Contributors

  • @shivambhatia604 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17198

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.6...v4.6.7

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17180
  • fix: Save button is not working on the app install configuration step by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17176
  • refactor: make new copy localizable by @mfranzke in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17207
  • fix: eventType atom team availability tab by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17158
  • chore: better request/response logging apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17210
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17209
  • fix: docs typo fix for deployment by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17140
  • feat: AvailabilitySettings atom toggle toasts by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17216
  • refactor: v2 and booker atom booking fields by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17168
  • feat: payments tab for event types atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16892
  • fix: platform event-type atom team delete by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17225
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17219
  • feat: round robin handover to specific host by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17215
  • feat: new webhook 'Form submitted, no event booked' by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17119
  • fix: Allow non-admin team members also to reroute by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17234
  • revert: team availability view by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17222
  • fix: invite modal when on mobile in orgs by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17238
  • fix: booking.controller clone req to avoid side effect apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17239
  • feat: Updated Huddle01 App Flow by @ponikar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16907
  • fix: slots troubleshooter data by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17217
  • fix: fixes for round robin reassignment by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17233
  • chore: Do not generate pages per language at build time by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17227
  • refactor: v2 response in case of duplicate managed user by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17214
  • fix: reset v2 & AvailabilitySettings atom availabilities and overrides by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17236
  • feat: v2 and atoms attendee defined meeting locations by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17224
  • fix: v2 seated bookings by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17045
  • chore: Back down vCPUs for public/slots routers by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17242
  • chore: v4.6.8 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17243

New Contributors

  • @ponikar made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16907

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.7...v4.6.8

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Booker atom weekly view by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17245
  • fix: API v1 hashedLink zod by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17248
  • fix: added aria-label to timezone input by @shivambhatia604 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17241
  • fix: cut off select in reassign dialog by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17249
  • fix: Salesforce - Check for existing lead when "Account" is set by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17254
  • chore: v4.6.9 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17255

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.8...v4.6.9

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: private team does not hide team members from event type page by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17099
  • fix: correct typos in E-Mail Settings and Organizations sections .envâ€¦ by @AliPythonDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17258
  • chore: make rate limit logs verbose api-v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17262
  • chore: remove json stringify from requestId logs api-v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17263
  • fix(a11y): added description for icon buttons by @mfranzke in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17184
  • feat: add no-show-to-edit-list by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17265
  • feat: add Dialpad conferencing by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15444
  • chore: make rate limit logs verbose api-v2 (revert) by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17273
  • perf: Load OOO in bulk for getSlots by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17270
  • fix: Attributes Not Updating by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17275
  • perf: New getTeamSchedule route with higher vCPUs by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17277
  • feat: attach booker name/email to insights CSV by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17280
  • fix: new reassignment email for RR host reassignment by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17279
  • feat: Salesforce - on booking, write to custom fields [CAL-4570] by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17257
  • chore: improve perf for fetching bookings in insights by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17281
  • fix: [CAL-4296] Fix Booking Text wrap issue for multi emails by @Raghul18 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16578
  • chore: add logs for debugging tasker by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17283
  • fix: default booking status filter booking.controller by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17282
  • fix: platform dashboard buttons by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17284
  • feat: add availability shown in rr reassign by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17287
  • fix: city names were not showing in the options. by @ShreyTanna29 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17064
  • fix: Keep 'Verify new route' enabled in the initial state. by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17295
  • fix: salesforce event creation duplicate error by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17292
  • chore: add event has been rescheduled title by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17286
  • fix: v2 event type locations by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17288
  • fix: insights event timeline perf and accuracy by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17218
  • fix: Wrong primary calendar selected for Google Calendar by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17301
  • feat: Org owners should be able to see all bookings in bookings tab. by @martinsione in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15314
  • chore: push minor improvements to gh actions & yarn.lock by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17302
  • fix: workflow reminder emails on reassigned bookings by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17305
  • fix: Salesforce if contact was created don't create new lead as well by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17299
  • chore: Release v4.6.10 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17296

New Contributors

  • @AliPythonDev made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17258

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.9...v4.6.10
